title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: This document outlines the functionalities, features, user requirements, ethical considerations, and potential technical challenges of NeuroMarketingAnalyzer. It serves as a foundation for the project's development. Key areas to be addressed include: data privacy and security (with GDPR compliance), user interface design (including accessibility), performance optimization, scalability, integrating with existing marketing tools, and real-time analytics support. The document will also highlight potential edge cases and mitigation strategies.

title: Design NeuroMarketingAnalyzer Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the tool, considering frontend, backend, and database components.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Input
description: Create a user-friendly interface for users to input product data and advertisements.

title: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing
description: Develop backend services to process the collected data and analyze consumer brain responses.

title: Setup Database for Data Storage and Management
description: Configure a suitable database to store user data, product information, and analysis results.

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend Services
description: Connect the frontend interface with the backend services for seamless data flow.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Input
Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Test and Validate NeuroMarketingAnalyzer
description: Perform thorough testing to ensure the tool functions correctly and meets user requirements.

title: Document NeuroMarketingAnalyzer Functionality and Usage
description: Create user manuals, API documentation, and any other necessary technical documentation.
